data.description: At World Kinect, our employees are the key to our global success. We are industry leaders due to the innumerable talents of our approximately 5000 strong professional team. Our people thrive in an entrepreneurial and culturally-diverse environment, where innovative thinking, collaboration and efficient execution are highly valued. Our high-performance culture is what allows us to drive sustained growth. Stronger together, we promote an environment where individuals can thrive.  Spend this summer (2026) with a global leader in the energy industry! The Power to Move Forward! https://www.world-kinect.com/about-usAt World Kinect, we ensure energy is there exactly when and where the world needs it today while investing in accelerating a more sustainable tomorrow. Keeping everything moving by solving complex challenges with a robust, scalable distribution platform across air, land, and sea. This is who we are. This is what we do. Every minute. Every hour. Every day.We are seeking highly motivated college students for our Technology Internship Program.  A must-have intern experience that gives students the opportunity to join an innovative team.  We work in more than 150 locations worldwide and come from a diverse range of cultural backgrounds that offer an equally diverse range of skills.  As a global leader in the energy industry, World Fuel Services offers exceptional individuals the opportunity to become part of a hugely successful international corporation. We are proud to be among the Fortune 100 companies.  We’re driving innovation by Digitizing our Global Business. Assignments will be in one of the following areas: Software Development, Cloud Programming, and Cloud Infrastructure. Interns will get exposure to IT Leaders and will have the opportunity to present their internship project outcomes at the end of the internship.      Job Requirements:Junior students currently enrolled in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or Business Technology.Must have programming experience - Software Development track!Local candidates only - Miami, FloridaCumulative GPA of 3.5 or better.Must have a scheduled graduation date of December 2026 or May 2027.Must be available to work onsite at our Corporate Headquarters in Miami, Florida. (June 1 through August 7th)Must have experience in software programming: Java/C#/Angular/JavaScript/HTML/CSS or other object-oriented programming experience.Understanding of information technology; including hardware, O/S, database technologies, middle-ware, micro-service application architecture and continuous delivery.Understanding of business fundamentals.Other Requirements:Eagerness and passion to learn with an elevated level of motivation and drive.Extraordinarily strong written and verbal communication skills.Work under minimal supervision and adapt to a dynamic, changing environment.Strong interpersonal and team-working skills.Must be a creative and innovative thinker.World Kinect is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.
requirements: Must have programming experience - Software Development track!
Must have a scheduled graduation date of December 2026 or May 2027.
Must have experience in software programming: Java/C#/Angular/JavaScript/HTML/CSS or other object-oriented programming experience.
